posts.post_content:
I have a small group of t206's to move as the collection is going in a different direction. Hopefully the link to photobucket works(Not my strength).  I can ship for free in plain white envelope.  $3.50 shipping for padded mailer.  Make offers.  Thanks.

Bender Portrait $100 (sold)
Evers Cubs $90 (sold)
Evers Chicago $60
Brown Cubs on shirt and pin hole $90 (sold)

This next group was sold to me as trimmed so I am listing them as trimmed
Bell trimmed $15 (sold)
Delehanty trimmed $15(sold)
Lord trimmed $15 (sold)
McLean trimmed $15 (sold)
Raymond trimmed $15 (sold)
Stovall trimmed $15(sold)


Abbaticchio $10 (sold)


[url]http://s1332.photobucket.com/user/plbstew/library/net54?sort=3&page=1[/url]

Paul,

I'll take

Bell, Lord, McLean

PM Sent
I'll take the Bender...Let me know if the Brown falls through...I'd take that too.
